programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Travis Shaw (Benjamin Walker) is a ladies' man who thinks a serious relationship would cramp his easygoing lifestyle. Gabby Holland (Teresa Palmer) is a feisty medical student who's preparing to settle down with her long-term boyfriend (Tom Welling). Fate brings the two together as Gabby moves next door to Travis, sparking an irresistible attraction that upends both of their lives. As their bond grows, the unlikely couple must decide how far they're willing to go to keep the hope of love alive.

programme.title: Rosewater
programme.desc: In June 2009, BBC journalist Maziar Bahari, an Iranian-born Canadian citizen, returned to his native country to interview Mir-Hossein Moussavi, the prime challenger to incumbent President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad. When Moussavi's supporters protested Ahmadinejad's declaration of victory, Bahari smuggled footage of the riots to the BBC. He was soon arrested by the Revolutionary Guard and -- led by a man known only as "Rosewater" -- was interrogated and tortured for 118 days.

programme.title: The Love Gala
programme.desc: When Kate is given the job of planning her mom's Garden Gala, the biggest fashion event of the year, she has to compromise with the unhelpful head of the Botanical Garden.

programme.title: Been There All Along
programme.desc: After her public breakup, Charley, the people-pleasing but determined founder of a dating app, is near bankruptcy and must team up with Liam, a self-assured and innovative marketing expert, to save her company. The answer to their problems may have been there all along.

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. A long-forgotten prophecy is unearthed in the basement of city hall.

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. Cassie's precious family heirloom goes missing from the museum exhibit.

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Movie. All is fair in love and Halloween.

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Series. Sam's ex-wife Linda threatens to come between them.

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: Hallmark Original Series. The arrival of a man from Cassie's past may complicate her relationship.

programme.title: Little John
programme.desc: Hallmark Hall of Fame. A father reunites his daughter and the child she gave up for adoption.

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: A master magician named Eisenheim vies with Crown Prince Leopold of Vienna for the hand of noblewoman Sophie, the girl he once loved. He brings his considerable powers to bear on the prince, as she is about to be named royal fiance. However, a police inspector named Uhl tries to warn Eisenheim that he is playing a very dangerous game.

programme.title: The Proposition
programme.desc: In the 1880s Australia, a lawman offers renegade Charlie Burns a difficult choice. In order to save his younger brother from the gallows, Charlie must hunt down and kill his older brother, who is wanted for rape and murder. Venturing into one of the Outback's most inhospitable regions, Charlie faces a terrible moral dilemma that can end only in violence.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven
programme.desc: New Orleans ad executive Marley Corbett (Kate Hudson) is a free-spirited woman who embraces her easy sexuality, shuns commitment, and gains support and strength from a close circle of friends. Then Marley learns she has terminal colon cancer. Despite her determination not to be tied down in a serious relationship, Marley finds herself falling in love with her handsome doctor (Gael Garca Bernal), even as her health slowly deteriorates.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: Following a traumatic experience, former Special Forces member Dean Cage (Wesley Snipes) is trying to pick up the pieces of his fractured life. With the help of detective Amy Knight (Jacqueline Obradors), Dean tries to block out the painful wartime memories, including the death of his best friend. Everything goes awry, however, when Dean is mistaken for a rogue CIA agent. He is abducted and given a truth serum, and now he must find an antidote to the debilitating psychotropic drug.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Best-selling pop diva Rachel Marron (Whitney Houston) has a stalker whose obsession has risen to the level of disturbing threats. At the urging of her manager (Gary Kemp), Rachel hires former secret service agent Frank Farmer (Kevin Costner) as her bodyguard. Initially resented and treated with disdain for his hard-nosed security procedures, Farmer soon becomes an integral part of Rachel's inner circle. As they spend more time together, client and protector become closer still.

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter (2010)
programme.desc: Jennifer Aniston and Gerard Butler, two exes continually one-up each other until they find themselves on the run for their lives.

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: A master magician named Eisenheim vies with Crown Prince Leopold of Vienna for the hand of noblewoman Sophie, the girl he once loved. He brings his considerable powers to bear on the prince, as she is about to be named royal fiance. However, a police inspector named Uhl tries to warn Eisenheim that he is playing a very dangerous game.

programme.title: The Proposition

In order to save his younger brother from the gallows, Charlie must hunt down and kill his older brother, who is wanted for rape and murder. Venturing into one of the Outback's most inhospitable regions, Charlie faces a terrible moral dilemma that can end only in violence.

programme.title: Transsiberian
programme.desc: On their way home from China, married Christian missionaries Roy (Woody Harrelson) and Jessie (Emily Mortimer) take a train from Beijing to Moscow. On board, they befriend Carlos (Eduardo Noriega) and Abby (Kate Mara). When Roy does not return in time at one stop, Jessie waits for him to catch up at the next station. Carlos and Abby stay with her, insisting the town is unsafe, however Carlos' attempts to "befriend" Jessie radically change the dynamic of the trip.

programme.title: Shark Night
programme.desc: A weekend at a lake house in the Louisiana Gulf turns into a nightmare for seven vacationers as they are subjected to shark attacks.

programme.title: The Bodyguard

programme.title: The Jesus Rolls

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: A counselor (The Rock) at a juvenile detention facility decides to turn the young inmates in his charge into a football team to give them a sense of self-respect and social responsibility, but he faces opposition from high-school coaches who do not want their players facing criminals on the field.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour (2011)
programme.desc: A group of young people hide out in a nightclub when aliens start to invade the planet. They eventually emerge to discover that they may be the only survivors left on earth.

programme.title: Transsiberian
programme.desc: On their way home from China, married Christian missionaries Roy (Woody Harrelson) and Jessie (Emily Mortimer) take a train from Beijing to Moscow. On board, they befriend Carlos (Eduardo Noriega) and Abby (Kate Mara). When Roy does not return in time at one stop, Jessie waits for him to catch up at the next station. Carlos and Abby stay with her, insisting the town is unsafe, however Carlos' attempts to "befriend" Jessie radically change the dynamic of the trip.

programme.desc: Includes exclusive never-before-seen footage and new interviews with Tammy Lee.

programme.title: New: Family Pictures
programme.desc: Sylvie and Maggie are two strangers living on opposite coasts, with similar lives.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom
programme.desc: Twenty-five years of swindling people are too much for Bloom and he wants out of the business. His brother, Stephen, convinces him to work on one final hustle, targeting an eccentric East Coast heiress named Penelope. The con game fails to play out as planned when Bloom falls in love with the irresistible woman.

programme.title: The Con Is On
programme.desc: In an effort to avoid paying off a massive gambling debt to a notorious mobster in England, two badly behaved con artists flee to Los Angeles, where they hatch a convoluted plot to steal jewels.

programme.title: Life of Crime
programme.desc: Double-crosses and plot twists abound when a corrupt real-estate developer (Tim Robbins) decides not to pay a ransom to his wife's (Jennifer Aniston) kidnappers (John Hawkes, Yasiin Bey).

programme.title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
programme.desc: Unfulfilled and facing financial ruin, actor Nick Cage accepts a $1 million offer to attend a wealthy fan's birthday party. Things take a wildly unexpected turn when a CIA operative recruits Cage for an unusual mission. Taking on the role of a lifetime, he soon finds himself channeling his most iconic and beloved characters to save himself and his loved ones.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The Turtles are back to battle a bigger threat alongside April O'Neil and vigilante Casey Jones. As they prepare to take on supervillain Shredder and his henchmen, Bebop and Rocksteady, they find themselves facing an even greater evil: the sinister Krang.

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: Young Charlie Kincaid, who discovers a secret headquarters under his home that seems to belong to a superhero. He shares it with his friends, and they start to believe that his estranged father might have a secret double life.

programme.title: The Phantom
programme.desc: The story begins as an expedition lands on the island of Bengalla, seeking the skulls of Touganda. Believed to harness an energy force of power, they could spell disaster for mankind.

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker
programme.desc: After his uncle dies, a young boy learns of his relative's true occupation as an undercover spy and is later recruited to be undercover himself. Based on the novel by Anthony Horowitz.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: In 1999, Ken Carter (Samuel L. Jackson) returns to his old high school in Richmond, California, to get the basketball team into shape. With tough rules and academic discipline, he succeeds in setting the players on a winning streak. But when their grades start to suffer, Carter locks them out of the gym and shuts down their championship season. When he is criticized by the players and their parents, he sticks to his guns, determined that they excel in class as well as on the court.

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: Commercial airline pilot Whip Whitaker (Denzel Washington) has a problem with drugs and alcohol, though so far he's managed to complete his flights safely. His luck runs out when a disastrous mechanical malfunction sends his plane hurtling toward the ground. Whip pulls off a miraculous crash-landing that results in only six lives lost. Shaken to the core, Whip vows to get sober -- but when the crash investigation exposes his addiction, he finds himself in an even worse situation.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: One of an elite group of assassins, Arthur Bishop (Jason Statham) may be the best in the business. Bishop carries out his assignments with precision, detachment and adherence to a strict code, but when Harry (Donald Sutherland), his close friend and mentor, is murdered, Bishop vows revenge. Harry's son (Ben Foster) comes to him with vengeance in his heart and a desire to learn Bishop's trade, signaling the birth of a deadly partnership.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: Tennessee Sheriff Buford Pusser (Joe Don Baker) carries a big stick after thugs beat him up and kill his wife (Elizabeth Hartman).

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: Thriller about the hijacking of Air Force One with the First Family on board.

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: When her home is invaded, a divorced woman and her young daughter hide in their "panic room".

programme.title: Lake Placid 2
programme.desc: Three giant crocodiles terrorize locals and tourists at a lakeside resort.

programme.title: The Shadow Riders
programme.desc: Two brothers return home at the end of the war to find their family has been kidnapped by Confederate forces.

programme.title: 711 Ocean Drive
programme.desc: Mal Granger (Edmond O'Brien) is a telephone repairman with a passion for horse betting. He puts his electronics expertise to work assisting gangster Vince Walters (Barry Kelly) in expanding his illegal racing wire, and, when Walters is murdered, Granger takes over the operation. However, Granger's growing success is soon threatened by both Larry Mason (Donald Porter), an East Coast mobster who wants in on the action, and Lieutenant Pete Wright (Howard St. John), who's after Granger for murder.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Clerk Freddie Clegg (Terence Stamp), an avid butterfly collector, wins a football pool and buys a country house with a large basement. He then kidnaps art student Miranda Grey (Samantha Eggar), a longtime crush of his, after trailing her in a van. Freddie locks Miranda in the basement, and buys her clothes and books, so that she can get to know him. They initially agree that she will stay at the house for a month, but Miranda fears what will happen when the time comes for her to leave.

programme.title: A Woman of Distinction
programme.desc: Reserved college dean Susan Middlecott (Rosalind Russell) is all business and can't be bothered with love. However, when Susan meets charming British astronomy professor Alec Stevenson (Ray Milland), it seems that romance could be in the air. Though she resists being paired with Alec, things don't go as planned -- particularly when a publicity agent and even Susan's amiable father (Edmund Gwenn) get involved. Soon Susan may just be in love, whether she likes it or not.

programme.title: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging (2008)
programme.desc: Georgia sets her sights on the new guy at school, Robbie. Unfortunately, Robbie happens to be dating Lindsay, her evil arch-rival. With her cat Angus and her girl posse, the Ace Gang, Georgia sets her schemes in motion to nab the boyfriend of her dreams.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In hopes of wooing a girl, Tristan promises to bring her a falling star. He soon discovers the star is actually a celestial beauty named Yvaine. When an old witch Lamia attempts to steal Yvaine?s youth, Tristan must protect her.

programme.title: Ghost Town
programme.desc: A spirited romantic comedy, Ghost Town is the story of Bertram Pincus, a cranky Manhattan dentist who develops the unwelcome ability to see dead people.

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: Based on the incredible true story, Meryl Streep delivers a hilarious and touching performance as a New York socialite who dreams of becoming a great opera singer, despite having a hilariously awful singing voice.

programme.title: Tremors 4: The Legend Begins
programme.desc: Prim East Coast dandy Hiram Gummer (Michael Gross) arrives in the town of Rejection, Nev., to investigate a series of strange deaths at the silver mine he owns. He receives help from local innkeeper Christine Lord (Sara Botsford) and miner Juan Pedilla (Brent Roam). But, when it turns out that gigantic killer worms that burrow underground are responsible for the miners' deaths, Hiram decides he'd better call in expert gunslinger Black Hand Kelly (Billy Drago) to save the day.

programme.title: Slither
programme.desc: Wheelsy is a small town where not much happens and everyone minds his own business. No one notices when evil slips in quietly but when people find mutilated livestock and a woman goes missing, Sheriff Bill Pardy discovers an alien organism that threatens to devour all life on Earth.

programme.title: Session 9
programme.desc: A tale of terror when a group of asbestos removal workers start work in an abandoned insane asylum. The complex of buildings looms up out of the woods like a dormant beast. Grand, imposing ... abandoned, deteriorating. The residents of Danvers, Massachusetts steer well clear of the place. But Danvers State Mental Hospital, closed down for 15 years, is about to receive five new visitors...

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Repairmen Val McKee (Kevin Bacon) and Earl Bassett (Fred Ward) are tired of their dull lives in the small desert town of Perfection, Nev. But just as the two try to skip town, they happen upon a series of mysterious deaths and a concerned seismologist (Finn Carter) studying unnatural readings below the ground. With the help of an eccentric couple (Reba McEntire, Michael Gross), the group fights for survival against giant, worm-like monsters hungry for human flesh.

programme.title: The Signal
programme.desc: A surprise awaits three college students (Brenton Thwaites, Beau Knapp, Olivia Cooke) who think they have tracked a rival computer hacker to a shed in the Nevada desert.

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: In 1879, the Zulu nation hands colonial British forces a resounding defeat in battle. A nearby regiment of the British Army takes over a station run by a missionary (Jack Hawkins) and his daughter (Ulla Jacobsson) as a supply depot and hospital under the command of Lieutenant John Chard (Stanley Baker) and his subordinate Gonville Bromhead (Michael Caine). Unable to abandon their wounded soldiers even in dire circumstances, the regiment defend their station against the Zulu warriors.

programme.title: The Eagle Has Landed
programme.desc: During World War II, Nazi officer Max Radl devises a plan to kidnap or kill the British prime minister. Approved by German Cmdr. Heinrich Himmler, the scheme moves forward with Col. Kurt Steiner leading the mission, aided by Liam Devlin, an Irishman with a deep hatred of England. As the plan unfolds, it seems to be going well -- until certain events threaten the group's shot at success.

programme.title: The Love Advisor
programme.desc: An assistant secretly writing love advice for her boss risks her career for a handsome journalist.

programme.desc: Temporary women workers as docile as a lamb lock arms together against mighty money.

programme.title: I Don't Fire Myself

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: Rival precinct chiefs race to catch a serial rapist in 2 weeks and win the 'Officer of the Year' title.

programme.title: Best Mistake 1 : The Movie (English Dubbed)
programme.desc: Kim Yeon Do (Lee Eun Jae) is a studious high school girl whose life is being made miserable by a boy from her past. Despite all of her efforts, she can't get peace as he won't leave her alone. So she hatches a plan. On her social media pages, she posts a picture of another boy, in the hope that this move will put an end to the irritation. But this move turns out to have unexpected consequences: It turns out that the boy in the picture is actually one of her schoolmates. Named Ji Hyun Ho (Kang Yul), he is a bit of a loose cannon. Although he is very popular, he dislikes studying - and prefers play. The rest of the school soon learns about the social media post, as news spreads fast in the classroom! This leads to a number of run-ins with ji Hyun Ho. But the more they get to know one another, the closer they get - causing yet further complications for a whole host of classmates!

programme.title: Killing Talk
programme.desc: Jae-pil, who runs a karaoke, has been receiving anonymous blackmails. One day, he gets into a fight with his friend Dae-hyun and ends up knocking him unconscious. Then he receives another text. It says the blackmailer will release the video of him killing Dae-hyun if he refuses to follow his orders. The order is to find one of his customers, Choi Sang- cheol, and kill him in time.

programme.title: Toxic Parents
programme.desc: Yoo-ri, a seemingly model student from a well-to do family suddenly commits suicide at a lakeside campsite with several people she met via a suicide group. Detectives suspect suicide, but her mother Hye-young firmly believes that her classmate Ye-na and homeroom teacher Gi-beom were the killers. Ye-na is an idol trainee and Gi-beom is a teacher who looked after Yoo-ri. As the investigation dives into the lives of these people, it spirals out of control due to conflicting statements between the three, but detectives find out that actions of Hye-young started causing cracks in Yoo-ri's heart. Deeply believing that she was doing everything possible for her child out of love, can Hye-young uncover the real truth behind her daughter's death?

programme.title: Oh! Brothers
programme.desc: After the death of his father who had left the house and his family, his debt was inherited by Sang-woo who is unable to cope with the debt. So he finds another heir, a half-brother and his mother, to fend off the debt of his father.

programme.title: Kaylah
programme.desc: Two worlds collide when a mama's boy prepares for marriage, but cannot shake his mother's grasp.

programme.title: Jump In
programme.desc: Troy Alexander returns to her roots, armed with a plan, to pass the bar and start her own practice. Although, her love of the law takes a back seat to her young son,Jordan, it provides an escape from realities. Troy is convinced she doesn't need love. She's content and love is a distraction, until her friends, Tarin and Camryn stumble upon Malik Bond, a middle school math teacher. Her friends plan a meeting and all doesn't go according to plan. Troy realizes that what Malik lacks in his wallet, he makes up for it in other areas. Sparks fly and life seems perfect... Then circumstances bring her well-thought plans to a halt. Her life flashes before her eyes, just as love lands at her door. Astounding revelations affecting the family in different ways, when the unthinkable happens.

However, when they both fall for the same man, their life-long friendship turns into an all-out war of the most 'outrighteous' kind. In this comical duel of good deeds will either woman get the man of their dreams?

programme.title: Just A Measure of Faith
programme.desc: Husband Jacob handles all the challenges alone, refusing to allow God to help. His wife, Kayla, a strong believer tries to help overcome both of their problems and lead him in the direction of Faith. With their close knit community along with family, friends and the church, Jacob and Kayla will find the love and support they need.

programme.title: Home Of The Brave

A young war veteran returns home eager to rejoin his brother and two close friends at the after-school program they started to help kids in their community. While working to make their dreams of expanding the program and impacting their community a reality they are faced with challenges that could put their program at risk. A young cop makes efforts to connect with the people in the community as one of the good guys. Confident that he's prepared for anything, he jumps right in to protect and serve but it doesn't take long for the young officer to realize that maybe he's not as prepared as he thought. The stories of these two men unfold as we witness their paths cross and their lives changed because of it.

programme.sub-title: Short Rope for a Tall Man

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A janitor-turned-gunfighter's reputation hangs on one lucky shot and a lot of gall. The handyman finds himself in trouble when he accidentally kills another gunfighter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to get help when he is shot after witnessing a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After being foreman of a jury that convicted an Apache, Lucas is marked for death. Now, he must discover who is behind the curse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two pranksters write away for a mail-order bride, using Lucas's name.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas recognizes Dr. Battle as an ex-gunslinger with whom he once fought. He helps with a dying man, but Lucas and the doctor have unresolved anger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A Chinese man and his son fight prejudice as they try to open a laundry in North Fork.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark decide to enter a local turkey shoot to raise money to buy a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark gets caught on a mountain ledge, a young outlaw risks his life to rescue him and breaks his leg doing so.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The notorious Shelton rides into the town of North Fork to take revenge on an elderly Marshal who is now crippled and working for Lucas McCain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Johnny Gibbs, Lucas McCain's brother-in-law, visits the McCain ranch. Gibbs, a rodeo rider wanted by the law, begins stirring up trouble.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A vengeful judge who believes Lucas was responsible for his son's death, kidnaps Mark McCain to revenge himself on Lucas.

With criminal cohorts Billy (Steve Cochran) and Turk (Chill Wills), Yellowleg embarks on a dangerous journey into Apache territory to lay the boy in his final resting place.

programme.title: Return of the Frontiersman
programme.desc: A sheriff (Jack Holt) leads a posse to capture his son (Gordon MacRae), who has been framed for bank robbery.

programme.desc: An escaped outlaw rejoins his old gang and plans his next heist.

programme.desc: Charlie Bates' dream about a holdup becomes a reality and he becomes the suspect.

programme.desc: Nancy Drake becomes jealous of her fiance's dog.

programme.desc: Newcomers get little welcome in a gold-mining town, particularly an Easterner who swindled his way in.

programme.sub-title: BEST OF THE BACK OFF CHALLENGE PART 3

As hailstorms rain down mid-swing, these golfers face a course that's constantly changing underfoot. The pressure is on as gut-wrenching insults fly, and hilarious, off-the-wall compliments throw off their focus. Watch as they try to keep their cool in the face of wild weather, relentless chirps, and unpredictable greens. Can these golfers hold their own under such crazy conditions? What would be your strategy to keep your focus with both hail and chirps coming at you on the course? Also Best of Country Club Adjacent's Back Off Challenge

As they play through the scenic and challenging Tillinghast-designed layout, the trio shares banter, competitive shots, and tips on navigating tricky greens and dramatic elevation changes. The episode balances insightful golf commentary with lighthearted camaraderie and humorous personal stories. programme.sub-title: Bear With Seal: Alaska Bear Hunt Part 2
programme.desc: Steven Rinella will take Navy SEAL Rorke Denver on his first hunt deep into the Alaskan backcountry to search for black bears in the mighty Alaska Range. In the remote wilderness, two friends will look into the differences and similarities between the hunter and the warrior. The bears are out but Rorke and Steve will have to work hard to put a tag on one.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Yukon Giants: Northern Alaska Moose Part 1
programme.desc: Dropped off by bushplane on a remote lakeside in the wilderness of Alaska's Brooks Range, Steven Rinella and wildlife biologist Brandt Meixell have ten days of hunting before the plane returns. Big-antlered Yukon moose are few and far between but hard work pays off for hunters who stick with it until the bitter end.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Yukon Giants: Northern Alaska Moose Part 2
programme.desc: Dropped off by bushplane on a remote lakeside in the wilderness of Alaskas Brooks Range.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Deer the Hard Way: Prince of Wales Island (Joe Rogan and Bryan Callen)
programme.desc: Steven Rinella has hunted this area before, but he feels he's just scratched the surface exploring the surrounding country. The top of the mountain is always calling Steve's name, and for this serious Alaskan backpack hunt he's bringing along comedians Joe Rogan and Bryan Callen. Cold, wet weather and tough hunting for wily Sitka deer make this a southeast Alaskan adventure these hunters will never forget.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: As the prime cuts are often the first to go, most families are left with a freezer brimming with ground wild game meat. Pulled from the pages of his forthcoming Wild Game Cookbook, Steve shares a variety of recipes from burger to meatloaf and more designed to whittle down this supply and jazz up your ground meat game.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Welcome to the Jungle: Adventures in Bolivia Part 1
programme.desc: Steve is fascinated by indigenous people who live in the wilds South America. In this three-part series, he travels deep into the Amazon jungle to hunt with and learn from the locals there. Not only will this be one heck of a hunting adventure, it will be a mind-opening, life-changing event. From bowfishing to hunting in the jungle at night, you never know what the evening's menu will bring.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Welcome to the Jungle: Adventures in Bolivia Part 2
programme.desc: Steve is fascinated by indigenous people who live in the wilds South America.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Welcome to the Jungle: Adventures in Bolivia Part 3
programme.desc: Steve is fascinated by indigenous people who live in the wilds South America.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: About Time: Helen and Brittany Hunt Elk in Montana

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Sky Island Solitaire: Backpack Hunting Coues Deer in Arizona
programme.desc: Steve returns to southern Arizona to stalk the elusive Coues deer. Unaccompanied, Steve immerses himself in the quiet southwest desert and gets intimate with one of the most wary animals in the west. Throughout the hunt, Steve articulates why solo time in trophy country is good for the soul.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Ribeye of the Sky: Sandhill Cranes in West Texas
programme.desc: Steve and bird hunting aficionado Ronny Boehme join up with wildlife biologist Ed Arnett in Lubbock, Texas.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: The Coldest Hunt: Nunivak Island Muskox
programme.desc: Lightning strikes twice: Steven Rinella has somehow beaten the odds and drawn a second Muskox tag after having to forfeit his first one four years ago due to unforeseen circumstances. Steve has always regretted passing up an opportunity to hunt Muskox but with another tag in his pocket, nothing will stop this adventure. We learn about the native history and culture of Nunivak Island's as Steve tries to stay warm while chasing Muskox 30 miles offshore in the Bering Sea.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: The last time Joe Rogan and Bryan Callen went out with Steven Rinella they were soaked head to toe and came home meatless. To remedy their meat crisis while keeping them dry, Steve sets up a springtime wild turkey hunt in sunny California. Steve gives Joe and Bryan the A to Z on hunting, butchering, and cooking the wild turkey. Steve caps off the introductory lesson by preparing his favorite turkey recipe: Schnitzel.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In the first part of this series, Steve attempts a unique spring hunt for sooty grouse in the coastal rainforests of southeast Alaska. These mysterious hooters make for a hunt that is markedly different from any other and success doesn't come easily. They say blind squirrels can find a nut, but will Steve harvest a grouse?

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In Part One, Steve experienced the difficulty of hunting the Sooty grouse of southeast Alaska.

programme.title: Our Wild Life
programme.desc: Chad and Kelli Varnado love the outdoor life, especially for their son Jack. Together, the family trap shoot in the backyard in preparation for the duck opener, as well as bring home a couple of squirrels harvested from their trees to cook into gravy and fry up for dinner.

programme.title: Dead Meat
programme.desc: Scott Leysath is targeting saltwater and freshwater fish in this action-packed episode of Dead Meat! Joined by a few familiar faces, Leysath is fishing for California Halibut off the coast of Santa Cruz with his pal, Kevin Phillips. From Santa Cruz to Reno, Scott meets up with River Klass, host of the Rach America TV show, for a little range time at Reno Guns & Range. And finally, the two join JD Richey, a 2024 California Outdoor Hall of Fame fishing guide, on Pyramid Lake for some Lahontan Cutthroat Trout action. Oh, and there's machine guns. Lots of machine guns!

programme.title: Feral
programme.desc: If you asked experts what the most prevalent predator species in the United States is, without hesitation, the answer would be the Burmese pythons in the Florida Everglades. Growing up to 26-feet long and weighing as much as 200 pounds, the Burmese python has completely altered the ecosystem of the Everglades by eliminating over 99% of the native mammal population. To save the 'Glades, the hunter has become the hunted as Dusty ""Wildman"" Crum has made it his mission to eradicate this species. Luckily for Yia, python is considered a delicacy in many countries, and Dusty believes these constrictors should be restricted to life on a plate, which helps take a bite out of the problem.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The most important fish catch is the one that got you hooked on fishing in the first place, and for many of us that catch happened early in life. On this episode Ali and Rush grab their favorite little fishing buddies for a great day on the water on their respective coasts. In Florida, Rush spends time with his son Kade fishing for huge permit while Ali takes his nephew Duke out for some wholesome yellowtail action in California.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: As the SoCal Bluefin Tuna fishing season begins to take shape, Ali and Rush head out to fish the waters of San Diego and see what new surprises may be in store for them this year. For many boats in the fleet, the heading turns to the south for a visit to the commercial tuna pen operation that often attracts other fish from miles away. It's parking lot fishing at its best, but with a change in technique and break from the crowd Ali puts Rush on the bite!

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: When it comes to fishing and the marine industry, we are often more united by the Bluefin tuna than we think. For Ali Hussainy, the Bluefin is responsible for fueling his life long passion as an angler, and in this episode he gets to share that passion with two friends that have their own ties to the species. For wildlife biologist Forrest Galante and master sushi chef Hiroyuki Terada, catching a bluefin tuna on rod and reel will be a first!

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The Local Knowledge crew heads to Catalina Island off the coast of Southern California to participate in the 2024 War Heroes On Water tournament. This event offers a unique opportunity for the sport fishing community to create meaningful connections with our nation's heroes while raising awareness of the challenges they sometimes face when transitioning back to civilian life. With a little bit of luck and a lot of teamwork, Ali and Rush hope to put their veterans on a Bluefin tuna bite they won't forget!

programme.title: Pain & Gain
programme.desc: Danny Lupo (Mark Wahlberg), manager of the Sun Gym in 1990s Miami, decides that there is only one way to achieve his version of the American dream: extortion. To achieve his goal, he recruits musclemen Paul (Dwayne Johnson) and Adrian (Anthony Mackie) as accomplices. After several failed attempts, they abduct rich businessman Victor Kershaw (Tony Shalhoub) and convince him to sign over all his assets to them. But when Kershaw makes it out alive, authorities are reluctant to believe his story.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Ignacio (Jack Black), or Nacho to his friends, works as a cook in the Mexican monastery where he grew up. The monastery is home to a host of orphans whom Nacho cares for deeply, but there is not much money to feed them properly. Nacho decides to raise money for the children by moonlighting as a Lucha Libre wrestler with his partner Esqueleto (Hctor Jimnez), but since the church forbids Lucha, Nacho must disguise his identity.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: A cocky ad executive, Marcus (Eddie Murphy) has a reputation as a ladies' man. However, Marcus gets a taste of his own medicine when a merger finds him working under the beautiful Jacqueline (Robin Givens), who has a similarly cavalier attitude about romance. Marcus and Jacqueline become involved, but he is put off by her noncommittal approach to their relationship. Meanwhile, Marcus also begins to develop feelings for the pretty Angela (Halle Berry), who is more thoughtful than Jacqueline.

programme.title: Ryan Erwin
programme.desc: He was awarded the 2018 Teaching Star of the Year winner by the Utah Middle School Teachers Association. His comedy comes a variety of sources from growing up with two deaf parents, to asking for the details on the latest girl drama at his school.

programme.title: Orlando Baxter
programme.desc: Orlando Baxter's fresh perspective and unique relatability makes this former high school teacher a fan favorite all over the world. In 2016, Orlando made his late night TV debut on the Conan show on TBS, and since then he's appeared on the television shows "Comedy Up Late" in Australia, B.E.T.'s "50 Central" and Laff Mobb's Laff Track on Tru TV.

programme.title: Rodney Laney
programme.desc: Rodney Laney has completed pilots for Comedy Central, MTV, and A&E. He has been seen on HBO, FOX News Channel's Red Eye, The Late Late Show on CBS, Comedy Central's Premium Blend, comedy.tv on the HD channel, two appearances on Gotham Comedy Live AXSTV, and Live in Gotham VR. He has appeared at the prestigious Just for Laughs Comedy Festival Montreal and LOL Lounge TBS Presents A Very Funny Festival: Just for Laughs Chicago.

programme.title: Susan Jones: Lady Ha Ha
programme.desc: Susan Jones is a tenacious headlining comedian, writer, master of ceremonies, and motivational force with national touring experience.

programme.title: Tony Calabrese: Fugettaboutit!
programme.desc: Tony Calabrese is frustrated with a few things: the Pope isn't Italian, vacations involve movement, and the AARP is the retired mafia.

programme.title: Danny Johnson
programme.desc: Danny Johnson's hilarious, clean stand-up has entertained audiences in comedy clubs, corporate events, and churches nationwide. Often called a cross between Jerry Seinfeld and Kevin James Danny's show is relatable, engaging, and always hilarious. Danny has starred in numerous TV commercials, Comedy Central's Laugh Riots, Florida's Funniest Comedian semi-finalist, Winner-Carnival Cruise line Comedy Challenge, Finalist in Search for the One Christian Comedy contest, and has had the pleasure of sharing the stage with Chris Rock, Bob Saget, Billy Gardell, Richard Lewis, and a variety of others. Danny has led a dual track career for over a decade achieving success in both corporate America and as a comedian. Blending his unique skill sets led to him publishing his first book, "You Stink and They Know It! A practical guide to nailing your next job interview."

programme.title: Caleb Elliott: Diary of a Smooth Black Kid
programme.desc: One of DryBar's youngest comics, Caleb Elliot proves that age is anything but a setback.

programme.title: Bob Zany
programme.sub-title: I Think I Handled That Well
programme.desc: He simply reaches into a bottomless grab bag of jokes, so smooth and effortless that it would be easy to overlook just how much talent and skill is behind the process'"

programme.title: Andy Gold
programme.desc: Andy Gold has appeared in festivals and competitions all over the country, including the Boston Comedy Festival, San Diego Comedy Festival, Laugh Your Asheville Off and Comcast's Trial by Laughter Comedy Festival. Andy's comedy has also been featured on Hulu and Kevin Hart's Laugh out Loud network on Sirius XM.

programme.title: Jamie Lissow
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Jamie Lissow is best known for his role in the current Netflix Original Series Real Rob, alongside SNL alum Rob Schneider, a show Jamie co-wrote and co-produced. Jamie made his network television debut on The Tonight Show and has since appeared on The Late Late Show, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central's Premium Blend, Gotham Live, Star Search, and his own half-hour Comedy Central special. A headliner at comedy clubs across the country, he's also been featured at The Montreal Comedy Festival and The Great American Comedy Festival. Lissow has appeared on Fox News Redeye more than 50 times while still managing to have no political opinions.

programme.title: Helene Angley: Queen Size
programme.desc: Helene brings honesty to the stage that helps everyone relax-- and laugh at the joys and pains of aging, being a married mother of two and all that the generation gap brings!

programme.title: Match Game Hollywood Squares Hour
programme.desc: Contestants compete to win cash prizes in a mash-up of two game show formats, first by trying to match celebrities' answers to fill-in-the-blank questions and then by choosing to either agree or disagree with celebrities' answers to trivia questions.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: In this original version of iconic game show "Family Feud," actor Richard Dawson plays host to two teams, each comprised of five family members, who try to match the answers given to survey questions asked to groups of people (typically 100 people in the group). The family that wins the game by being the first to reach a certain point total, either 200 or 300 depending on the rules at the time, advances to the bonus round, called Fast Money, for a chance to win thousands of dollars by answering more survey questions.

programme.title: Family Feud

programme.title: Password
programme.desc: Two contestants, each teamed with a celebrity partner, compete in a word-association game. One player tries to guess a word based on clues offered by his or her partner. The game is timed, and if the clue-giver inadvertently says part of the word, a buzzer sounds and that round is lost. When the time is up, the team with the most points wins, and the non-celebrity contestants wins cash.

programme.title: Steve
programme.desc: For five seasons, Steve Harvey hosted a daytime talk show that was based in Chicago. In 2017, looking to focus more on celebrity guests, the show got a face-lift -- including shortening the title to simply "Steve" -- along with a move to Los Angeles, where there is no shortage of famous people for Harvey to welcome to his stage as guests. In addition to conducting interviews, Harvey brings his fresh -- and often funny -- perspective to the day's hot topics and Hollywood happenings. The show also features games and comedy and lifestyle segments. Whether he's chatting with a star or sharing his opinions on the news, Harvey does it as only he can.

programme.title: Laugh & Learn
programme.desc: Laugh & Learn is a charming educational show designed for preschoolers, where entertainment meets learning. Featuring adorable characters, the show introduces children to fundamental concepts such as numbers, letters, shapes, and colors through interactive play, memorable songs, and engaging storylines. Each episode encourages curiosity and cognitive development while ensuring children have a joyful and laughter-filled experience. With its vibrant animation and child-friendly approach, Laugh & Learn by Mattel is a trusted companion for parents and a beloved favorite among young viewers

Alongside his friends, including Tiger the dog, Pig, and Arnold the piglet, Kipper embarks on a variety of adventures that emphasize friendship, curiosity, and the joy of discovery. The show is known for its gentle humor, engaging storytelling, and colorful animation that appeal to preschool-aged children. With each episode, young viewers are invited into Kipper's world where everyday experiences turn into magical explorations, fostering a love for learning and imagination.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Wordsworth: First Words Around the House
programme.desc: As their communication skills continue to develop, little ones begin to recognize common words and may point to objects or pictures when these items are named. This engaging program presents little ones with familiar objects in the kitchen, playroom, yard and more -- from the living room window to their favorite teddy bear.

programme.title: Baby Einstein

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: With the Dolittle, and other Baby programs under their belts, the tots who follow Julie Aigner-Clark's Baby Einstein series will sidle up to Baby Newton expecting a similar exploration of building blocks to brilliance, but this time there's a wrinkle or two. Animation makes its first appearance, and parents steeped in keep-it-simple culture may object to the springy "I Know My Shapes" song, a departure from classical-only video predecessors.

programme.title: Baby Einstein

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: All of Berry Bitty City is gathered around to watch the last snowberrykin melt. As the last bit of snow forms a puddle, a cheer goes up, spring is here! It's now time for the annual BerryFest. But with Princess Berrykin out of town on business, who will be the BerryFest Princess and preside over the festival?! Everyone is abuzz with how to go about choosing the Princess and what her duties will be. Postmaster Bee declares the only fair way to go about it is to hold an election. Everyone agrees.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry opens her front door to a throng of Berrykins all cheering for the new BerryFest Princess. She is appreciative of their admiration but unsure of exactly what her duties entail. In response the Berrykins bombard her with her duties - major to miniscule. One Berrykin sums it up by telling her she's responsible for presiding over all the activities of the BerryFest to make it the best.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: All of Berry Bitty City is excitedly making their way through the berry batch in search of the elusive Wanderberry. It is to be the dessert at the BerryFest Feast. Everyone is milling about searching for it on their own when Blueberry points out that the rules say the BerryFest Princess is in charge of the search. The girls turn to her for direction and she points them where she thinks the berry might be.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.sub-title: Nothing To Fear But Berries Themselves
programme.desc: Overhearing Blueberry reading a story to the baby Berrykins about the scary Galumphalot, Orange is uncharacteristically shaken. She determines she doesn't want anything scary around her, just relaxation. But while the girls are having a hair-styling party at Lemon's salon, a malfunction at the BerryWorks causes the whole town to go dark. And Orange begins to get really anxious.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.sub-title: Where, Oh, Where Has Our Blueberry Gone?
programme.desc: Blueberry has become obsessed with the mystery book detective heroine, Patti Persimmon. She decorates her store with Patti posters and rearranges her shelves to make room for all the Patti books she's ordered. Blueberry begins to neglect outings with her friends and even goes so far as to dress like her idol just to emulate her. She then starts looking for cases to solve around town.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The grove around Berry Bitty City is abuzz with activity. The Berrykins are using their sparkles to harvest berries, Berrykin Bloom is in his garden spraying flowers with a special solution to make them larger, and Raspberry is nearby gathering flower petals to make perfume. The wind starts to blow and picks up some of the sparkles. The sparkles float along the wind and get combined with some of Berrykin Bloom's solution.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: It's time again for the Dance-Off between the Big Bitty City Dance Team and the Berry Bitty City Dancers. Plum is stressed out and frazzled because she desperately wants to win. And the Big Bitty City Dancers are a force to be reckoned with. They are elegant and beautifully synchronized. Plum shows the girls a maze of dance steps that she's choreographed in the hopes of creating a winning piece. The problem is, the contest is only 1 week away!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls are all gathered at the caf. Mr. Longface stops by and Strawberry offers him some fresh applesauce but he declines, as he doesn't care for it. He's only there for some tea and, being that he's new in town, doesn't know what the group is up to.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake

Mavis has dumped her focus on fashions in favor of an even glitzier show called Lifestyles of the Berry Big Bitty Stars, and she wants her first segment to be about how pop superstar Cherry Jam spends her vacation.

programme.desc: Strawberry, Cherry and the girls form a new band, Strawberry and the Sweet Beats, and prepare to go on the road to perform at the Opening Ceremony of the Berry Big City Games! While master mechanic Berrykin Bruce turns Cherry's tour bus into the band's hotel-on-wheels, Strawberry and her friends pack for the big trip. But the rest of Berry Bitty City points out that someone needs to run the girls' businesses while they are gone. Strawberry and her friends give the Berrykins a crash course in city-sitting.

programme.title: A Boy and His Dogs
programme.desc: Berrykins Ed and Earl report to Princess Berrykin and Strawberry that they are certain there is a monster in the berry patch! They saw something with many noses and many tails making weird noises in the bushes. But upon further investigation by Strawberry and her friends, it is discovered that friendly boy Huckleberry Pie was driving his pet-mobile of orphan dogs through the countryside, took a wrong turn and got stuck near Berry Bitty City. What the Berrykins mistook for a monster was really the bunch of cute pups Huck has been trying to get adopted. While Huck's van is being repaired, Strawberry invites Huck and his seven pups to spend the night in the new bedroom above the marketplace, while she bunks in her old bedroom above the caf. The next morning, Strawberry discovers that the playful pups have given her bedroom a total makeover the wrong kind. An embarrassed Huck insists on staying until he can repair the damage.

programme.title: Sid's Holiday Adventure!
programme.desc: But this year, Sid and his family are visiting relatives where it's chilly and cold. Sid wonders why it can't be warm everywhere? At school, Sid discovers that temperatures are different all over the world!

programme.title: The Wind Did It!
programme.desc: At school, Sid and his friends discover that wind is strong enough to make sand dunes, waves, move sail boats, and even blow away a pile of leaves!

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Up in the Air // AdDRESSing the Problem
programme.desc: Ling Ling is waiting for Rainbow Ruby, looking worried. It turns out that Mr. Sloth's best friend Chirpee is depressed. Chirpee wants to fly high but is struggling due to his small wings and lack of means to learn how to fly. // Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that the dress that the paper doll Paige was planning to wear to Kiki's dance party is torn. Paige very much wants to go to the party but she cannot go without a dress.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Ruby's Ranger Adventure // The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: When Ruby and Choco arrive at the village, they find a very worried looking Ling Ling. Gina, Ellie, and Thunderbell went camping in Rainbow Forest but they saw a monster in the forest, got scared and had to run away. // Ruby is struggling to make a doll with her dad. Ruby and Choco get their suitcase and as Ruby swings her umbrella, there they are, in front of Rainbow fountain. Mayor Ling Ling tells her that today is the day of Princess Kiki's ballet performance.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: At Your Service // A Hard Rain
programme.desc: There is a new menu at the restaurant, which is very popular. There is a long line in front of the restaurant but there weren't enough staff members to serve the villagers the food. Rainbow Ruby turns into a waitress using her magic suitcase and serve tables kindly. // Rainbow Village is full of marbles. The marbles that Rainbow Ruby spilled in her room poured down into the village from up above the sky! Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to transform into a paramedic.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Gina, Thunderbell, and Choco try to cheer Jessy up but their efforts are of no use. While talking to Mayor Ling Ling, Rainbow Ruby realizes that today is the day that Jessy first arrived in Rainbow Village! Jessy was upset that her friends forgot such a meaningful day to her. // Ling Ling has caught a bad cold and was sneezing all over the place. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase and transforms into a doctor and cares for him.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Behind the Scenes // Paperdoll in Peril
programme.desc: Ling Ling is worried about the play planned for tonight. There are no costumes ready for the villagers so it's hard to figure out which roles they're playing. Rainbow Ruby transforms into a costume designer and designs costumes for her friends. // It is very windy in Rainbow village and Paige, a paper doll, is flying to wherever the wind takes her. She is so light that she is blown away by the wind. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a fire fighter and rescue Paige.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Singing in the Rain // Mail Carrier Mayhem
programme.desc: Ling Ling is worried that the villagers are all in low spirits. Ruby thinks of fun games to play but the villagers say that they have already played all of the games too many times. Rainbow Ruby transforms into a singer. // Ling Ling is worried because of the "Secret Present Swapping Party" that Thunderbell is preparing. Thunderbell forgot to send out the invitations. Rainbow Ruby turns into a mail carrier and delivers the invitations.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Going Golfing // Case of the Stolen Spectacles
programme.desc: Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that a Rainbow Ball Tournament is about to start soon but he is worried because the field is covered with pokey pods. Thunderbell, Ellie, and Gina are trying to pick them up and clear the field but it is not easy since the pokey pods are so spikey. // Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that he lost his glasses. Then Ellie tells her she lost her needles, Gina her hat, and Thunderbell his wheels. Who could have taken away all these things?

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Up in the Air // AdDRESSing the Problem
programme.desc: Ling Ling is waiting for Rainbow Ruby, looking worried. It turns out that Mr. Sloth's best friend Chirpee is depressed. Chirpee wants to fly high but is struggling due to his small wings and lack of means to learn how to fly. // Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that the dress that the paper doll Paige was planning to wear to Kiki's dance party is torn. Paige very much wants to go to the party but she cannot go without a dress.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Kiki wants to become a movie actress but the villagers have no idea how to direct a movie. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to turn into a movie director. She then assigns roles to the village friends. // Ling Ling rushes toward Rainbow Ruby to tell her that a busy villager mom asked him to take care of her three children but he just doesn't have time to look after them. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to transform into a babysitter and starts babysitting the children.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Wakey Wakey // Rules of the Road
programme.desc: Princess Kiki is asleep, UP IN THE AIR! According to the note that Kiki left behind, a princess falls under a spell from time to time and in order to break it, they need to play the music box nearby Kiki. But the music box is broken. // Rainbow Ruby and Choco discover cars moving in every direction. Ling Ling asks Rainbow Ruby for help and she uses her magic suitcase to become a police officer.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that today is Noodle Festival day in the village but there is a problem. The problem is that the noodle tree, which grows noodles, decided to take a year off and is not growing any noodles this year. // Ling Ling and the friends are worried about the discouraged Gina. Gina just announced that she will stop doing somersaults anymore because she accidentally hurt her friends while practicing.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: A Colorful Way to Cool Off // Seeing in Believing
programme.desc: Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that Rainbow Village friends were playing around the Rainbow fountain to cool off from the heat but water suddenly stopped coming out of the fountain. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a plumber and starts fixing the fountain. // Kiki's face has turned purple because she ate magical Plumen berries. Kiki accidentally picked magical Plumen berries instead of the delicious rainbow berries she was trying to gather.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Bad Hair Day // Ice is Nice
programme.desc: Ellie's and Jessy's hair are a complete mess after Felicia accidentally causes some Rainbow fruit to fall on them. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a hairdresser. // It's winter in Rainbow Village. Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that last night a huge ice mountain appeared so everyone is enjoying an ice sculpture festival. But Jessy seems to have a toothache.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: The ground is all wet in Rainbow Village. What's going on? The friends tell Ruby that Jessy's tears have soaked the ground. Jessy accidentally ate Ellie's magic beans and became as huge as a giant. // Thunderbell is very sad because his best friend, Mr. Sloth, is angry at him. Rainbow Ruby thinks up the best way to apologize to Mr. Sloth, who loves performances. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a choreographer.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and the gang are painting a mural for Four-Wheeled Friendship Day! But with Avery in charge, the friends start to lose confidence in their work. She may be a master when it comes to art, but Avery has a lot to learn about being project leader! // When the pals befriend a mouse in the barn, Rumble can't resist breaking the rules by bringing the little guy a snack. Before long there are mice everywhere! Rev and Rumble will need to shoo away their tiny guests, before Mom and Dad find them!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev finds out that Bo wants to be a Police Kid, he tells a white lie to make him one for a day! Officer Bo takes the new job too far, ticketing everyone-for everything. Rev will have to tell the truth to fix this mess and get his friend back! // At Camp Sleepaway, Bo is homesick. His friends try to lift his spirits, but after a stinky trip to the outhouse, he's had enough! That is...until a suggestion from Rev helps Bo to see the beauty all around. Maybe camp isn't so bad after all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev hears a snowstorm is coming, he starts building the best winter track ever! One problem...Rev is sick. No matter what his friends say, they can't keep him away. Eventually he'll need to admit the best way for him to help is to go home and rest. // When Rev and Avery investigate veggie-rustling rabbits, they form a posse to run them out of town. The Cowboy Kids track down the thieving rabbits and discover they have babies! Now the posse will need to help the rabbits find a better way to feed.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Gear Up Garage Band // First Aid Fun
programme.desc: At band practice, Rumble struggles to control his nervous backfiring, even damaging the instruments by accident! Determined not to give up on the festival, the gang improvises and uses makeshift instruments. They even feature Rumble's nervous twitch! // When Rev and Owen begrudgingly agree to join Bo's First Aid Games, they do everything BUT take the lessons seriously. It isn't long before the boys find out that first aid isn't all fun and games, but it IS totally awesome!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Bo to the Rescue // Ice Cream Team
programme.desc: When Bo messes up on a few rescue missions, he decides to quit Bo's Rescue Hotline. Wanting to help their friend, the gang creates fake emergencies for Bo to solve. But as the friends find out, it takes more than trickery to build self-confidence! // As a heatwave hits Fender Bend, Rev and his friends look forward to Ice Cream Dream Day! But when the ice cream truck breaks down, it's up to the gang to find a way to deliver the tasty treats before they all melt.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev, Rumble and their friends help capture a group of wayward llamas, they each try and claim sole credit for the round up. Rev's parents listen patiently to the elaborate tales, each one starring a different hero, before ruling it a team effort! // When Avery creates a magnetic modification for Rumble, it seems to be the perfect solution. Now Rumble can help them tidy up the Gear Up Garage! But things get complicated when Rumble turns into a super-magnet, attracting all kinds of metal debris!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: After many years of working hard on Accelerator Acres, Tilly the tractor is ready to retire from ranch life. Rev wants to find her the perfect new job, but his ideas are too intense for old Tilly. He'll have to adjust to her slower pace first. // Rev and the gang compete for the title of Best Prankster-except Lori sits out, claiming pranks aren't her thing. After a full day of pranks and laughs, the kids gather for the big party that Lori planned for them...but all is not as it seems!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Anything You Can Do // A Very Avery Day
programme.desc: As Rev and Avery compete to see who can be the best helper, they accidentally work against each other and end up making things more complicated for those they // Rev thinks Avery is moving away! Upset, he leads an all-out effort to convince her to stay, showing her that Fender Bend is the best place to live-despite Avery's protests that she's too busy. Finally, Avery confronts their strange behaviour.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Green Phantom // Over Easy Does It
programme.desc: Rev is sure he has the perfect plan to catch an elusive frog, but Avery isn't so sure. After all of his attempts fall through, he's finally ready to accept help-and Avery's idea just might work! Will they finally catch the Green Phantom? // Rev and Avery compete to transport supplies to town for a big event. Avery is faster, so Rev tries to take a short cut to get ahead-but an obstacle stops him in his tracks. How will he finish his delivery in time, let alone win the competition?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery go on an adventure to discover the Crystal Cavern. As they enter the first cave, a swarm of bats scare Rumble so much, he takes off through a maze of tunnels! They can't worry about the Crystal Cavern-they have to find Rumble first! // When Molly tells a campfire story about the Fender Bend Beast, the kids' imaginations run wild. Covered in goop and debris, Rumble scares them into thinking he's the Beast! Avery hatches a plan to trap the "Beast" and save Rumble, who's gone missing

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Winter Bestival // The Mystery of Missing Trees
programme.desc: After a snowstorm, Rev and Avery compete for title of Champion of the Winter Bestival! Avery is determined to hold her title from last year. Rev's Dad suggests a "slow and steady" approach to win, but Rev can't resist using "Rumble power!" // When Rumble wakes Rev in the middle of the night, they hear a strange sound, and see lights in the forest. The next day, Ben encourages them to investigate further. Rev and his friends follow the trail of missing trees to discover the truth!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Wild Wheelin' Stunt Park // The Castle of Fender Bend
programme.desc: When damage from a storm threatens to cancel the Wild Wheelin' Stunt Park Skills Contest, Owen is disappointed he won't get to compete. Rev leads the kids in the Stunt Park clean-up, and soon discovers that this is really an opportunity in disguise! // Rev and the gang make their own castle and play as knights of old. But when their sticks and building supplies begin to disappear, Bo leads them into a medieval battle of wits with the culprit-a cranky beaver!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev offers to help look after a rambunctious puppy, Rumble gets jealous of all the attention he gets. And much to his annoyance, while Rev and Avery try everything to teach the pup new tricks (with no success), it only has eyes for Rumble! // When Rev tries to teach Rumble to swim with his special inflated tires, Rumble keeps sinking to the bottom of the pond. Ben and Molly suggest they get advice from Gilly, the old Fender Bend ferry pilot.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Bumper Ball // Vroom with a View
programme.desc: When a game of Bumper Ball gets a little too heated, the friends start competing against their own teammates! But when a stray ball knocks open the sheep pen, they'll have to learn to work together to round up the sheep...and get back to the game! // Rev and his friends receive a map in pieces, so they race up separate mountain trails, vying to be first to claim the treasure at the top. But when there's no treasure in sight at the end, Rev's parents have some advice for finding the real reward.

programme.title: Kids Planet
programme.desc: Wow, I Never Knew That! is a whimsical, half-hour television series that is jam-packed.

programme.title: Tommy the Little Dragon
programme.desc: Tommy is a soft toy who lives with an ordinary panda family. Panda parents have no idea about him, while their cubs cannot live a day without Tommy! With the help of his magic soap bubbles, Tommy teleports kids to wonderful universes full of adventures, to help them discover a vast and captivating world, fight their fears and inhibitions, and learn important family values.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Robocar POLI - Trust your friends & Helly's Birthday: On the day with a lot of lightening one of wheels in the Mr. Wheelers store is stolen. As Poli detects this case everyone is getting not to trust each other. Is it really true Brooms town has a thief?

programme.title: Jenny's Magic Shop
programme.desc: Jenny and her best friend Blam the Teddy Bear run a magic shop in the town of Dreamville, where everybody can come for magical help. The residents of Dreamville always leave the shop thanking Jenny, but actually, they set the stage for their own miracles, leaving behind in the shop whatever is keeping them from living life and making decisions. After all, the ability to change yourself is the truest form of magic. Jenny and Blam never refuse to help anyone, but it often happens that they're the ones who need help, since Jenny's still a kid and Blam's an eccentric teddy bear.

programme.title: The Fixies
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them!

programme.title: Back to Back
programme.desc: Embark on an electrifying journey as they boldly leap from one heart-pounding expedition to the next, fueled by their unbreakable bond and insatiable thirst for excitement. Get ready to be swept away in a whirlwind of adrenaline-pumping quests, where danger and discovery await them at every turn.

programme.title: Helper Car
programme.desc: Cartoon for kids about helper cars: a fire truck, an ambulance, a police car and a tow truck. Why these cars and trucks are useful? Because they help people and other cars: fire truck can put out fire, ambulance helps people, when they are hurt or sick, it could drive them to the hospital. Police car patrols the city. Tow truck help other cars, when they are broken down. Watch new car cartoon and learn about helper cars!

programme.title: Minecraft and Roblox and More with Amy Lee
programme.desc: Hey Guys! I am Amy Lee! Welcome to my Channel! Check it out for videos on Minecraft, Roblox, The Sims plus other great games!

programme.title: TurboZaurs
programme.desc: The adventures of dinosaur's squad transforming into big machines who are willing to solve any difficulties that kids may face in their everyday life.

programme.title: Pins and Nettie
programme.desc: Pins and Nettie are besties and there is nothing they like more than going on adventures together, most of time.

programme.title: IncrediTales
programme.desc: IncrediTales - Tricky Wolf: Alice is eating a yummy ice cream in the park but Wolf is up to his old tricks.

programme.title: Soothing Melodies
programme.desc: A journey of Soothing Melodies like Hush Little Baby, nurturing relaxation and sleep.

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: This episode offers calming lullabies like Twinkle Twinkle, Let's go to sleep, and many more!

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Create magical dreams as you sway away to calming melodies featuring Annie, Elly and Kent

programme.title: Soothing Melodies
programme.desc: Immerse in a world of Soothing Melodies like Finger Family, Little Boy Blue, and more

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: From I hear thunder to Farmer in the Dell presenting lullabies that will help kids sleep well.

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: Sweet lullabies for peaceful slumber for kids. Hush Little Baby, Little miss Muffet and many more.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Peaceful tunes that wrap children in comfort, helping them fall asleep with ease.

programme.title: Chiki Art Soothing Moments
programme.desc: Chiki Art Soothing is a creative journey combining art like Glitter Fish, Mermaid, and relaxation.

programme.title: Chiki Art Soothing Moments
programme.desc: Dive into Chiki Art Soothing's world filled with artworks like Glitter Fish, Shooting Star and more

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
programme.desc: The Avengers prepare for a party with a surprise guest when Ultron crashes the preparations by using mind control on Iron Man. While trying to rescue their leader, the rest of the team discovers that Baron Stucker, HYDRA, and Yellowjacket are in on Ultron's plans. While preparing for a party at Avengers' Tower, THE AVENGERS (IRON MAN, CAPTAIN AMERICA, BLACK WIDOW, HAWKEYE, THOR, HULK and VISION) notice Iron Man acting strangely. When Iron Man volunteers to go out and get more ice, they find it odd: when has Tony every volunteered to get anything? Suddenly, ULTRON appears on a screen: he's taken control of Iron Man! To make matters worse, Ultron takes over all the versions of Iron Man's armor and they fly off! The Avengers must now fight one of their own, and they're not sure what to do! Cap and Thor lead the charge, but can't fend off Iron Man and Ultron's Minions. Meanwhile, Black Widow, Hawkeye and Hulk track down a signal that seems to be controlling Iron Man from a castle in the Little Sokovia section of New York. There they fight HYDRA and BARON VON STRUCKER and learn that YELLOWJACKET is the bug that infected Iron Man's suit for Ultron. To help break Iron Man free from Ultron's control, the Avengers call in their own bug...ANT MAN! Finally, the Avengers confront Ultron and his Ultron Minions as they attack Avengers' Tower. Ultron's ultimate plan: use all the data/stuff they've stolen to free the newly rebuilt IRON LEGION, destroy the Avengers, and control the world. Tony dons the hastily repaired Hulk Buster Armor and it's on! It's a huge battle as the Avengers try to save their beloved HQ and defeat Ultron. Will they succeed? And, more importantly, can their party be saved after Ultron tries to take down their Tower?

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RVmaybe they can mod that for their own, knightly use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rollingin THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. Of course I'm the leaderI'm a Richmond.

programme.title: DOYOUNG 'Promise' MV
programme.desc: The lyrics, written by DOYOUNG, capture the feelings he couldn't easily express as his love grew deeper. Even if the confession comes late, it delivers a sincerity and emotional resonance stronger than any other words.The title track Promise is an impressive ballad that begins with a minimal piano melody and gradually builds emotional depth as strings are added in the latter half.

programme.title: DOYOUNG 'Whistle (Feat. BELLE of KISS OF LIFE)' Live Clip
programme.desc: The track Whistle (Feat. BELLE of KISS OF LIFE) is an R&B ballad that depicts a moment of exchanging feelings through the sound of a whistle. Layered over a jazz guitar melody, the sweet vocals blend together like a conversation, conveying a lovely sense of fluttering excitement. With Belle participating as a featuring artist and harmonizing with DOYOUNG, the synergy between the two elevates the charm of the song even further.

programme.title: EXO 'REVERXE' Trailer
programme.desc: EXO has returned with a new trailer. At the end of the trailer, the title of EXO's 8th full-length album, REVERXE, was finally revealed. Based on EXO's universe storyline the day we truly become one, a new world will open the album name reinterprets the word Reverse in EXO's own style, carrying the meaning a new world opens once again, further heightening anticipation.

programme.title: EXO 'I'm Home' MV
programme.desc: I'm Home is a pop ballad that blends delicate piano melodies with lush strings, expressing the happiness of being reunited with loved ones and the wish to stay in this moment for a long time.EXO has hinted at a new winter song that follows the emotional resonance of the chart resurgence of First Snow.
